column1: Online TransactionPay Online   Link to External Website
• Race Equality and Diversity Team
Information for Health and Social Care Workers on how Tameside Social Care and Health is supporting the cultural and language needs of these communities.
Information for victims of racial harassment
• Radar Key
A key for disabled toilet access
• Rail - Timetables
Links to National Rail's web site detailing train timetables
Links to the community database holding details of independently run rambling clubs within the Borough.
• Rats and Vermin
The council provides a discreet, humane service to get rid of rats, mice and insect pests - the council also carries out commercial pest control work for local businesses.
• Recycling
Tameside council is committed to encouraging recycling - for a full list of recycling centres, detail of local tips or to purchase a composter
• Red Bins : Confidential Waste Paper Service
General Information on referenda in Tameside.
• Refuse Collection
Frequently asked questions regarding the service, to query your collection date or to report problems
For details of our recycling sites, civic amenity sites and levels of service
For details of some of the regeneration work currently being carried out in Tameside. Also available: Census Profiles of Regeneration Areas
• Regional Centre of Excellence (North West)
The Office of the Deputy Prime Minister launched the Centres of Procurement Excellence initiative in February 2004, in order to support Councils in delivering the National Procurement Strategy.
• Register of Electors
You must be named on the electoral register if you wish to use your right to vote.
• Registering and Taxing a Vehicle
Information on taxing and registering a vehicle
frequently asked questions about the registration of births, marriages and deaths
• Registration and Inspection
Registration and inspection of care services in Tameside, such as Care Homes, is carried out by the Commission for Social Care Inspection.
Information covering benefits and help for tenants of private rented properties
Repatriation of the deceased into or out of the UK can be a very complicated procedure.
Provides more information on Care Homes (residential and nursing homes) in Tameside.
• Research Governance Framework (RGF)

The Department of Health have issued a new framework for managing research within health and social care. This involves all research involving service users / carers or staff and includes care that is contracted to other agencies as well as provided directly by a local council.
The council is responsible for registering restaurants and for carrying out regular inspections. To comment or complain about restaurant hygiene or food quality, contact 0161 342 8355
Details of retail opportunities in the Borough.
• Retaining Walls, Structures and Bridges
For details of maintenance and to report problems/damage
• Riding Establishments
Apply for a Riding Establishment Licence
• Rights of Way
Details of Public Rights of Way within Tameside
• Ring and Ride
Ring and Ride is a service provided by Greater Manchester Transport for disabled people
Details and map of M60 Manchester Outer Ring Road
Details of major roadworks currently underway around the Borough
• Road Safety Unit
Tameside's road safety unit provides education, training and publicity for all age ranges and all types of road user.
The council cleans all streets in the borough on a rota basis and has a maintenance programme
• Room Hire
Many council buildings have halls and meeting rooms for hire
Links to the community database holding details of Roman Catholic Churches within the Borough
A guide to getting extra help and support with employment if you have a disability or mental health' illness
• Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals
Links to the home site of the Tameside and Glossop branch of the RSPCA
• Rubbish
We will remove up to 5 items such as furniture and cookers for a small charge
Links to the community database holding details of independently run Rugby clubs within the Borough.
Advice on development and planning permission around farms.
Still not found what you are looking for? Try our Search or our A to Z of Services:
